definition: hematoma (internal blood clot)/extravasated blood (spilt into surrounding tissue)/contusion

sentences.english: The physical bruises had all gone away. The emotional had stayed.
sentences.chinese: 身體瘀傷過去都好了，可情緒的去依舊還在。

sentences.english: Moore looked at the wrists, encircled by bruises.
sentences.chinese: 莫拓森望向受害者的手腕，有一圈瘀傷。

sentences.english: He bruised his shin knocking against the chair.
sentences.chinese: 他腳杆骨撞到椅子而受瘀傷。

sentences.english: This can cause excessive bleeding or increased chance of bruising.
sentences.chinese: 這會引發過量的流血或增大瘀傷的機率。

sentences.english: A shortage of platelets results in bruising and easy bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 而血小板不足則會導致瘀傷和極易出血。

sentences.english: His bruise was a trick to play truant from school.
sentences.chinese: 他以瘀傷作爲逃學的藉囗。

sentences.english: He escaped with only minor cuts and bruises.
sentences.chinese: 他逃脫了，只有輕微的割傷和瘀傷。

sentences.english: I brush my teeth and hop in the shower.
sentences.chinese: 我刷了牙，跳進淋浴，滿身都是瘀傷。

sentences.english: At the store or the market, purchase produce that is not bruised or damaged.
sentences.chinese: 在商店或市場不購買瘀傷或損壞的產品。
沿着他的鎖骨瘀傷有指紋。

sentences.english: However, this bruising is very slight and will fade away soon after the treatment has been done.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這是很輕微瘀傷和治療後很快會消失已做。

sentences.english: Where did he get those bruises on his ribs?
sentences.chinese: 那他肋部瘀傷是哪裏來的？

sentences.english: Dein bruises, due to the large body bleed to cause death.
sentences.chinese: 鄧恩全身大面積瘀傷，由於失血過多導致死亡。

sentences.english: He knew that it had a circle of black where the rope had bruised it.
sentences.chinese: 他知道，脖子上的黑圈是絞索勒出來的瘀傷。

sentences.english: Buka even bruises if you don't protect her enough.
sentences.chinese: 布卡即使瘀傷如果您沒有足夠的保護她。

definition: to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
to meet violent death/to get killed
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
